timeline.author: ibacher

timeline.bodyText: Do we explicitly need this here? I kind of preferred implicitly loading it via HAPI.
timeline.author: ibacher

timeline.bodyText: Is it possible to leave out these version changes from this PR? That way I can actually merge this 😁
timeline.author: ibacher

timeline.message:
Fixes/modifications for iSantePlus compatibility

iSantePlus (https://github.com/IsantePlus) is a OpenMRS 2.0.5
distribition used in Haiti. It extensively uses `Obs` to store a wide
range of medical data that might be stored in different part of the
OpenMRS data model in newer distributions, and that maps to multiple
FHIR resources. The FHIR2 module is being used for lab comminication and
continuity of care purposes. This commit contains fixes and
custom translators to enable the fhir2 module to be used with iSantePlus.

See [FM2-303](https://issues.openmrs.org/browse/FM2-303)
